item.title: Docker-Compose
item.description: Docker compose Basic example # docker-compose.yml version: '2' services: web: build: . # build from Dockerfile context: ./Path dockerfile: Dockerfile ports: - "5000:5000" volumes: - .:/code redis: image: redis Commands Create resources for compose project docker-compose up Remove resources for compose project docker-compose down Start existing containers in compose project docker-compose start Stop existing containers in compose project docker-compose stop List containers in compose project docker-compose ps Reference Building web: # build from Dockerfile build: .
